airlock.name: Air Lock
airlock.shortDesc: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.

arenatrap.name: Arena Trap
arenatrap.shortDesc: Prevents adjacent foes from choosing to switch unless they are airborne.
arenatrap.desc: Prevents adjacent opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out unless they are immune to trapping or are airborne.

battlearmor.name: Battle Armor
battlearmor.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.

blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.shortDesc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's Fire-type attacks have 1.5x power.
blaze.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its Fire-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.5.

chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll
chlorophyll.shortDesc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

clearbody.name: Clear Body
clearbody.shortDesc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

cloudnine.name: Cloud Nine
cloudnine.shortDesc: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.

colorchange.name: Color Change
colorchange.shortDesc: This Pokemon's type changes to the type of a move it's hit by, unless it has the type.
colorchange.desc: This Pokemon's type changes to match the type of the last move that hit it, unless that type is already one of its types. This effect applies after each hit from a multi-hit move.

compoundeyes.name: Compound Eyes
compoundeyes.shortDesc: This Pokemon's moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.3.

cutecharm.name: Cute Charm
cutecharm.shortDesc: 1/3 chance of infatuating Pokemon of the opposite gender if they make contact.
cutecharm.desc: There is a 1/3 chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will become infatuated if it is of the opposite gender.

damp.name: Damp
damp.shortDesc: Prevents Explosion/Self-Destruct/Aftermath while this Pokemon is active.
damp.desc: While this Pokemon is active, Explosion, Self-Destruct, and the Aftermath Ability are prevented from having an effect.

drizzle.name: Drizzle
drizzle.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Rain Dance.

drought.name: Drought
drought.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sunny Day.

earlybird.name: Early Bird
earlybird.shortDesc: This Pokemon's sleep counter drops by 2 instead of 1.

effectspore.name: Effect Spore
effectspore.shortDesc: 10% chance of poison/paralysis/sleep on others making contact with this Pokemon.
effectspore.desc: 10% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be poisoned, paralyzed, or fall asleep.

flamebody.name: Flame Body
flamebody.shortDesc: 1/3 chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be burned.

flashfire.name: Flash Fire
flashfire.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Fire attacks do 1.5x damage if hit by one Fire move; Fire immunity.
flashfire.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Fire-type moves, as long as it is not frozen. The first time it is hit by a Fire-type move, damage from its Fire-type attacks will be multiplied by 1.5 as long as it remains active and has this Ability. If this Pokemon has a major status condition, is a Fire type, or has a substitute, Will-O-Wisp will not activate this Ability.

forecast.name: Forecast
forecast.shortDesc: Castform's type changes to the current weather condition's type, except Sandstorm.
forecast.desc: If this Pokemon is a Castform, its type changes to the current weather condition's type, except Sandstorm.

guts.name: Guts
guts.shortDesc: If this Pokemon is statused, its Attack is 1.5x; ignores burn halving physical damage.
guts.desc: If this Pokemon has a major status condition, its Attack is multiplied by 1.5; burn's physical damage halving is ignored.

hustle.name: Hustle
hustle.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Attack is 1.5x and accuracy of its physical attacks is 0.8x.
hustle.desc: This Pokemon's Attack is multiplied by 1.5 and the accuracy of its physical attacks is multiplied by 0.8.

hypercutter.name: Hyper Cutter
hypercutter.shortDesc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Attack stat stage.

immunity.name: Immunity
immunity.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be poisoned. Gaining this Ability while poisoned cures it.

innerfocus.name: Inner Focus
innerfocus.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be made to flinch.

insomnia.name: Insomnia
insomnia.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

intimidate.name: Intimidate
intimidate.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of adjacent opponents by 1 stage.
intimidate.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of adjacent opposing Pokemon by 1 stage. Pokemon behind a substitute are immune.

keeneye.name: Keen Eye
keeneye.shortDesc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's accuracy stat stage.
keeneye.desc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's accuracy stat stage.

levitate.name: Levitate
levitate.shortDesc: This Pokemon is immune to Ground; Gravity/Ingrain/Smack Down/Iron Ball nullify it.
levitate.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Ground. Gravity, Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball nullify the immunity.

lightningrod.name: Lightning Rod
lightningrod.shortDesc: This Pokemon draws single-target Electric moves used by opponents to itself.
lightningrod.desc: If this Pokemon is not the target of a single-target Electric-type move used by an opposing Pokemon, this Pokemon redirects that move to itself. This effect considers Hidden Power a Normal-type move.

limber.name: Limber
limber.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be paralyzed. Gaining this Ability while paralyzed cures it.

liquidooze.name: Liquid Ooze
liquidooze.shortDesc: This Pokemon damages those draining HP from it for as much as they would heal.

magmaarmor.name: Magma Armor
magmaarmor.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be frozen. Gaining this Ability while frozen cures it.

magnetpull.name: Magnet Pull
magnetpull.shortDesc: Prevents adjacent Steel-type foes from choosing to switch.
magnetpull.desc: Prevents adjacent opposing Steel-type Pokemon from choosing to switch out unless they are immune to trapping.

marvelscale.name: Marvel Scale
marvelscale.shortDesc: If this Pokemon is statused, its Defense is 1.5x.
marvelscale.desc: If this Pokemon has a major status condition, its Defense is multiplied by 1.5.

minus.name: Minus
minus.shortDesc: If an active Pokemon has the Plus Ability, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x.
minus.desc: If an active Pokemon has the Plus Ability, this Pokemon's Special Attack is multiplied by 1.5.

naturalcure.name: Natural Cure
naturalcure.shortDesc: This Pokemon has its major status condition cured when it switches out.

oblivious.name: Oblivious
oblivious.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be infatuated. Gaining this Ability while infatuated cures it.
oblivious.desc: This Pokemon cannot be infatuated. Gaining this Ability while infatuated cures it.

overgrow.name: Overgrow
overgrow.shortDesc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's Grass-type attacks have 1.5x power.
overgrow.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its Grass-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.5.

owntempo.name: Own Tempo
owntempo.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be confused. Gaining this Ability while confused cures it.

plus.name: Plus
plus.shortDesc: If an active Pokemon has the Minus Ability, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x.
plus.desc: If an active Pokemon has the Minus Ability, this Pokemon's Special Attack is multiplied by 1.5.

poisonpoint.name: Poison Point
poisonpoint.shortDesc: 1/3 chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be poisoned.

pressure.name: Pressure
pressure.shortDesc: If this Pokemon is the target of a move, that move loses one additional PP.
pressure.desc: If this Pokemon is the target of another Pokemon's move, that move loses one additional PP.

raindish.name: Rain Dish
raindish.shortDesc: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon heals 1/16 of its max HP each turn.
raindish.desc: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon restores 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn.

rockhead.name: Rock Head
rockhead.shortDesc: This Pokemon does not take recoil damage besides Struggle/Life Orb/crash damage.
rockhead.desc: This Pokemon does not take recoil damage besides Struggle, Life Orb, and crash damage.

roughskin.name: Rough Skin
roughskin.shortDesc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/16 of their max HP.
roughskin.desc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down.

sandstream.name: Sand Stream
sandstream.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sandstorm.

sandveil.name: Sand Veil
sandveil.shortDesc: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is 1.25x; immunity to Sandstorm.
sandveil.desc: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is multiplied by 1.25. This Pokemon takes no damage from Sandstorm.

serenegrace.name: Serene Grace
serenegrace.shortDesc: This Pokemon's moves have their secondary effect chance doubled.

shadowtag.name: Shadow Tag
shadowtag.shortDesc: Prevents opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out.
shadowtag.desc: Prevents opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out.

shedskin.name: Shed Skin
shedskin.shortDesc: This Pokemon has a 33% chance to have its status cured at the end of each turn.
shedskin.desc: This Pokemon has a 33% chance to have its major status condition cured at the end of each turn.

shellarmor.name: Shell Armor
shellarmor.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.

shielddust.name: Shield Dust
shielddust.shortDesc: This Pokemon is not affected by the secondary effect of another Pokemon's attack.

soundproof.name: Soundproof
soundproof.shortDesc: This Pokemon is immune to sound-based moves, except Heal Bell.

speedboost.name: Speed Boost
speedboost.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Speed is raised 1 stage at the end of each full turn on the field.
speedboost.desc: This Pokemon's Speed is raised by 1 stage at the end of each full turn it has been on the field.

static.name: Static
static.shortDesc: 1/3 chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be paralyzed.

stickyhold.name: Sticky Hold
stickyhold.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot lose its held item due to another Pokemon's attack.

sturdy.name: Sturdy
sturdy.shortDesc: OHKO moves fail when used against this Pokemon.
sturdy.desc: OHKO moves fail when used against this Pokemon.

suctioncups.name: Suction Cups
suctioncups.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be forced to switch out by another Pokemon's attack or item.

swarm.name: Swarm
swarm.shortDesc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's Bug-type attacks have 1.5x power.
swarm.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its Bug-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.5.

swiftswim.name: Swift Swim
swiftswim.shortDesc: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

synchronize.name: Synchronize
synchronize.shortDesc: If another Pokemon burns/poisons/paralyzes this Pokemon, it also gets that status.
synchronize.desc: If another Pokemon burns, paralyzes, or poisons this Pokemon, that Pokemon receives the same major status condition. If another Pokemon badly poisons this Pokemon, that Pokemon becomes poisoned.

thickfat.name: Thick Fat
thickfat.shortDesc: The power of Fire- and Ice-type attacks against this Pokemon is halved.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.shortDesc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's Water-type attacks have 1.5x power.
torrent.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its Water-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.5.

trace.name: Trace
trace.shortDesc: On switch-in, or when it can, this Pokemon copies a random adjacent foe's Ability.
trace.desc: On switch-in, or when this Pokemon acquires this ability, this Pokemon copies a random adjacent opposing Pokemon's Ability. However, if one or more adjacent Pokemon has the Ability "No Ability", Trace won't copy anything even if there is another valid Ability it could normally copy. Otherwise, if there is no Ability that can be copied at that time, this Ability will activate as soon as an Ability can be copied. Abilities that cannot be copied are the previously mentioned "No Ability", as well as Comatose, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Schooling, Stance Change, Trace, and Zen Mode.

truant.name: Truant
truant.shortDesc: This Pokemon skips every other turn instead of using a move.

vitalspirit.name: Vital Spirit
vitalspirit.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

voltabsorb.name: Volt Absorb
voltabsorb.shortDesc: This Pokemon heals 1/4 its max HP when hit by a damaging Electric move; immunity.
voltabsorb.desc: This Pokemon is immune to damaging Electric-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by one.

waterabsorb.name: Water Absorb
waterabsorb.shortDesc: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Water moves; Water immunity.
waterabsorb.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Water-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by a Water-type move.

waterveil.name: Water Veil
waterveil.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.

whitesmoke.name: White Smoke
whitesmoke.shortDesc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

wonderguard.name: Wonder Guard
wonderguard.shortDesc: This Pokemon is only damaged by supereffective moves and indirect damage.
